The "function" package provides the interfaces to implement custom-made manipulation of data.

See: Description

Package bzh.plealog.hge.api.function Description

The "function" package provides the interfaces to implement custom-made manipulation of data.

Functions are used from a query. So before using a function, it has to exist somewhere in the system: this is the purpose of the Function package.

Describing a function

You create a function by implementing a new class that directly inherits from AbstractFunction. Then you add that function to the HGE core system using FunctionSystem.addFunction(Function).

Using a function

You can use a function as soon as it exists in the FunctionSystem of HGE. For instance, if you have define a function named "Cardinality", then you use that name in a query.
